CSCG.description: The CSCG is an annual CTF competition that spans two months and serves as the qualifier for the DHM.

GPNCTF.description: GPNCTF is an annual CTF competition hosted by KITCTF at the GPN chaos event in Karlsruhe.

SEKAICTF.description: SekaiCTF is an annual CTF competition, hosted by PROJECT SEKAI which is a very well known and international CTF team. The competition itself is known for its sizable prize pools and for serving as a prequalifier for events like MaltaCTF and XCTF.

DHM.description: The DHM is the annual CTF final round of the CSCG qualifiers, where teams of 6 members compete against each other for the chance to qualify for the ECSC.

KITCTF.description: KITCTF organizes the local IntroCTF @KIT every semester and the GPNCTF annually.

SMILEYCTF.description: This was the very first edition of SmileyCTF hosted by "America's #1 CTF team" named .;,;.

UMDCTF.description: UMDCTF is an annual CTF competition hosted by the University of Maryland.

FCSC.description: The FCSC is the French equivalent of the CSCG/DHM and serves as the qualifier for selecting the French team for the ECSC.

EHAX.description: EHAX is an 24-hour CTF competition hosted as part of Invictus DTU's mega tech fest.

LACTF.description: LACTF is an annual CTF competition hosted by ACM Cyber at UCLA.

DVCTF.description: DVCTF is annualy held by DaVinciCode, the academic team of the École supérieure d'ingénieurs Léonard-de-Vinci.
